short_summary: Construct RFP for floating docks to the Shippagan SAR station at the Shippagan Public Wharf
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Octions (DFO) requires construction
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites contractors to submit a proposal for the construction of floating docks at the Shippagan Public Wharf, Shippagan, New Brunswick.

#### Tender Details
248900542336 | [EC015-240728 - Floating Docks - Shippagan NB](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18694238?extsite=MTg2OTQyMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

- Invitation Type: Request for Proposal
- Classification: Construction
- Location: Shippagan, New Brunswick
- Solicitation Number: WS4424290424

#### Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) wishes to establish a contract for the construction and delivery of floating docks at the Shippagan SAR station.

#### Contact Information
To request a copy of the solicitation documents, please contact:

Grant Stewart  
SPAC/PSPC  
E-mail: [stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Timeline
- Publication Date: February 2, 2024
- Tender Closing Date: February 26, 2024, 14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: February 28, 2024
- Expected Contract End Date: April 30, 2024

Note that the tender was originally issued as a competition, but I excluded this information as the tender status had changed to expired. You will want to verify the tender status with the government entity directly.   
 It has also been assumed that the solicitation does not have any GSIN prior to populating the fields below. I suggest you fill in the relevant information based on your research of the solicitation. I used OLD finding information for the date thereof. Problem description
